sentences.sContent: People from the church would come by my trailer from time to time to tell me they were still praying for me, and that they hoped I would come back to Jesus before I wound up in hell.
sentences.sContent_eng: People from the church would come by my trailer from time to time to tell me they were still praying for me, and that they hoped I would come back to Jesus before I wound up in hell.
sentences.sCn: 教会的人时不时会到我的拖车上来，告诉我他们依然在为我祈祷，希望我不要在去往地狱的道路上越走越远，早日回到耶稣我主的身边。

sentences.sContent: Sometimes going over the top is good, if you can let yourself go from time to time, people will notice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sometimes going over the top is good, if you can let yourself go from time to time, people will notice.
sentences.sCn: 有时挣脱束缚是好的，如果你能够让自己一次又一次地挣脱束缚，人们会注意到你的。
